issue.title: [Java] race in AllocationManager during release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4104](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4104). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is caused due to a bug in my changes for ARROW-1807. The synchronization is happening on the BufferLedger instance instead of the AllocationManager instance.
